channel.title: misc on Freedom Of Information
channel.description: Recent content in misc on Freedom Of Information

item.title: 23-00001-CHAI
item.description: Emailed Gary Gensler directly (chair@sec.gov) to ask for help around the foia request for his emails. Received a generic response from the FOIA branch chief. I’ve sent previous emails to chair@sec.gov and this is the first one I have received a ID’d response.

item.title: 23-00009-REMD
item.description: Still searching for information about the 5/13/21 meeting. Have gone through two requests and an appeal. This is the first ID’d request remand that I have experienced with the SEC FOIA office.
